message: Let's start fair. I think 60/40 is a good first offer. What do you think?
Your offer was a bit unfair to me.  I'm proposing a 70/30 split instead. Think carefully, the value decreases with each round!
Okay, I understand you want more. Let's try a 40/60 split. If you reject this, the next round will be even worse for me, and probably not worth your while either.
